[just stay with netflix or other competitors, at least they are being honest]

Basically this company will raise your subscription fee from 199k to 799k/annual and user may cancel the subs if we can send notification 1 day prior due date, which is totally fine. 

Problem is they send this info to user not 1-2 days prior due date but ON THE SAME DAY ?! how we supposed to know, have time to consider & cancel the subs if we want to ? 

Is this your hacky way to scam your customer for higher revenue ? lol its not very ethical, its very shameful. Will definitely stop the subs & not recommend this to anyone.
